feed.title: Chromatix Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Astrysk: v0.5.10
entry.content:
Amazing news, the Reddit post went live on r/selfhosted and received good feedback! Check it out here: r/selfhosted - astrysk

Features

  • Alert for setting URL schema when authenticating. Avoids the need to put in http:// or https://

Bug Fixes

  • Issue with pasting in username and password in input fields on iOS 17 has been resolved
